But The Patriot was never meant for long range combat. It's shortened barrel and stock made it primarily a close range weapon used in conjunction with CQC. It's a gun better suited for a Soldier, not a sniper.

"Well, here's a list of all the SMG reskins/mods on Gamebanana.":http://tf2.gamebanana.com/skins/cats/1913

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55022b5b6368722be8950300#post_55022b5b6368722be8950300
Except for one problem. The Soldier doesn't have a SMG. Just a Rocket Launcher, a Shotgun, and a Melee (At default, but he doesn't have a SMG at all.)
Beside, the Sniper's SMG can help him a lot in close quarter, taking out enemies that are too close to snipe.

I have a feeling the anime is going to become super popular for the mere fact of it having monster girls.

What I mean by this is let's count how many current anime have monster girls that aren't nekos: 0

So when it comes out it'll have 0 competition and everyone that likes monster girls will watch it therefore say hello to metric fucktons of viewers.
